ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (COVID-19 â€” Wage and Rent Subsidies)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (COVID-19 WAGE AND RENT SUBSIDIES) in order to prescribe three additional four-week periods under which eligible organizations can receive continued support through the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy and Canada Emergency Rent Subsidy from December 20, 2020 to March 13, 2021.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0284 Publication Date: 2021-01-06
